name: PIMPAH: Pilah Sampah dan Limbah Jelantah
name_original: PIMPAH: Pilah Sampah dan Limbah Jelantah
description:
PIMPAH: Pilah Sampah dan Limbah Jelantah is an educational game developed by ratikita. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play PIMPAH: Pilah Sampah dan Limbah Jelantah on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
